turns.content: How did the Australian men's rugby team perform in their matches at the Olympics?

I do not have access to real-time data, but i can report on the performance of the australian men's rugby team at previous olympic events. 

the australian men's rugby sevens team made their olympic debut at the 2016 summer olympics in rio de janeiro, brazil. they started strong by winning their first match against france 31-14, but then suffered losses to south africa and spain in the preliminary rounds. despite their losses, they qualified for the quarterfinals, where they defeated france for a second time. in the semifinals, they played against fiji, the eventual gold medalists, and were defeated 20-5. in the bronze medal game, they played against great britain, but lost 24-17 and finished in fourth place.
That's interesting. Do you know if Australia is participating in the men's rugby event at the Tokyo Olympics?

Yes, Australia is participating in the men's rugby event at the Tokyo Olympics. The Australian men's rugby sevens team is among the 12 teams that have qualified for the tournament. The team will compete in three Pool B matches against New Zealand, Argentina, and Korea. The men's rugby sevens competition will take place from July 26 to July 28, 2021, at the Tokyo Stadium.
